decoworld.client.currency

Class CurrencyPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.client.currency.CurrencyPanel

  • public class CurrencyPanel
extends java.lang.Object
    CurrencyPanel class creates a panel which displays the player's money on the game screen. It will send request to the server with the current PlayerId whether player's money is updated. If so, then the new value is set and displayed on the CurrencyPanel.

    • Method Detail

      • getWindow

        public com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Window getWindow()
        Returns Window type an instance of CurrencyPanel class. The return added to the GameScreen class to display a current player's money.
        Returns:
        Window type

      • update

        public void update(int[] currency)
        Updates CurrencyPanel values with given integer array. CurrencyPanel values is updated through DecoWorld class when the response received from the server by the Client class.
        Parameters:
        currency - array of integer values for currency
